Reviews.Title: great tv for a small space
Reviews.Author: kenya
Reviews.Content: We live in a tiny 1 bedroom apartment, so this tv was perfect.  The picture and sound are both really great.

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: Eugene Wallace
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a small TV to be placed next to our full size TV so I can keep track of another program to see if I should switch to it.  It has a VERY sharp picture and the sound is quite good for a small TV.

Reviews.Title: :Picture great, but antenna problem annoying
Reviews.Author: Barbara Metzler Dible
Reviews.Content: It has an attena problem. Keeps saying low antenna. Did not do it in the beginning. Still using same antenna. Other than that great picture. Gets 60 stations.

ProductInfo.Features:
19" LED panel - With a 1366 x 768 resolution
Built-in digital tuner - Watch digital broadcasts, including HDTV programs where available
5 ms response time - Quick response time for a great picture
1,000,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio
True 16:9 aspect ratio
ProductInfo.Name: Sansui 19" Class Led/lcd 720p 60hz Hdtv, Sled1953w
